subject: Football
Domestic Violence
Appointments and Executive Changes
lead_paragraph: Jones, who led the Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco, Firearms and Explosives since 2011, will discipline players and work with Lisa Friel, who will investigate off-field misconduct.
snippet: Jones, who led the Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco, Firearms and Explosives since 2011, will discipline players and work with Lisa Friel, who will investigate off-field misconduct.
